Package requestMembers

Class RequestRaceMember

java.lang.Object
requestMembers.RequestRaceMember
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class RequestRaceMember extends Object implements Serializable
The RequestRaceMember class is a Request class and it used to send a request from the client to the server. This Request class is used to send this kind of request: 1)Drawn all race from the database based on the id of a Member.
2)Join a race
Author:
Spagni Alex Zuelli Arianna

      Class constructor.
      Parameters:
      typeReq - an integer value that distinguish which request client has sent to the server.
      idmember - id of the member who is making the request.
